channel.title: Artists on Shoaib's Home
channel.description: Recent content in Artists on Shoaib's Home

item.title: Programming: The artist and the hustler
item.description: In the world of programming, I have come across 2 very distinct kinds of people who I refer as The Artists The Hustlers In this post, I am going to use the R programming language as reference to demonstrate features of the mentioned programmers extraordinaire. Heads up: I am a proud hustler who loves visiting the gallery and works on his art in the shadows. Any bias is definitely subject to scrutiny by current artists.
